Considering its quality and unique features, I believe it would be an excellent addition to your collection. For a limited time, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $140. This is a fantastic opportunity to own a high-quality item at a discounted rate. Please let me know if you're interested in securing this deal. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $140. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $140
(2) Reject Alice's offer
